recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
preparation_method: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and minced garlic, sauté until onions are translucent.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve the Bolognese sauce over the cooked spaghetti, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
preparation_method: In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Add sliced chicken and stir-fry until cooked through. Remove from the wok and set aside.
In the same wok, add sesame oil and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Return the cooked chicken to the wok, add soy sauce and oyster sauce. Stir to combine.
Serve the chicken stir-fry over cooked rice.
